description: Bachelor's button (Centratherum punctatum 'Button Beauty') is an amazing plant species with a unique and eye-catching beauty. It is a low-growing, drought-tolerant annual that produces vibrant flowers in shades of pink, blue, white, and purple. It is a low-maintenance plant that loves full sun and is perfect for brightening up any landscape or container garden. Plus, its long flowering period is a delight for gardeners and pollinators alike! Bachelor's button is a stunning addition to any garden, providing season-long color and drama that will be sure to wow everyone!
